Philadelphia has a gun violence problem. Through Code for Philly, I am leading [a civic tech project](https://github.com/CodeForPhilly/vacant-lots-proj) that will help solve this problem by empowering community groups to carry out cleaning and greening interventions in the vacant properties where they can have the biggest impact.

Explore [the live version of the dashboard here](https://www.cleanandgreenphilly.org/) or read more about it in the PDF below.
